name: Sesame Peanut Candy Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Sesame Peanut Candy Recipe: Sugar 2 cups White Vinegar ½ cups Roasted Sesame ½ cup Roasted Peanuts ½ cup Butter 2-3 tbsp Butter Paper as required
instructions: Take 2 cups sugar, ½ cup vinegar and water in the pan. Cook it all the mixture turns brown. Add in 1 cup 1 cup roasted peanuts and ½ cup roasted sesame mixture. Spread 2-3 tbsp butter on the butter paper and put the mixture over it. Cool it cut it into pieces and serve.
